svg.text: McCzarny recently made several updates across
his repositories. In McCzarny/ghsummary, he
added support for specifying user pronouns and
refined the Gemini API integration by updating
to newer models and improving summary prompts.
For McCzarny/git-simulator-ai-slop, he focused
heavily on deployment and UI enhancements. He
updated GitHub Pages deployment to use master
and develop branches and streamlined the
Next.js deployment workflow. UI improvements
included adding a "Reset" button to the Git
Explorer, which restores the repository to its
initial state. He also refactored the Git
Explorer view to feature a floating, draggable
controls menu with branch merging capabilities
and persistent position. Additionally, he
integrated GitHub Pages deployment support and
updated the README with a live project link.
Other commits in this repository involved
removing the draggable attribute from
CommitNode and refining the app export process.
In McCzarny/upload-image, he accepted a
Dependabot pull request to bump the undici
dependency. He also rebuilt distribution files
and enabled testing for pull requests targeting
the master branch in this repository.
Generated on: Sun Jun 15 02:07:06 2025
